channel.title: Tags/CGI on Seb Hirsch - Motion Design & Visual Effects
channel.description: Recent content in Tags/CGI on Seb Hirsch - Motion Design & Visual Effects

item.title: Posca
item.description: A high-end CGI product lighting and shading study featuring a bottle of “Posca” (an ancient Roman drink) in a historically themed environment. This project served as a deep dive into realistic materials and lighting techniques.

item.title: Sky Lanterns
item.description: A CG simulation showcasing complex particle and lighting effects, exploring the behavior of multiple light sources in a dynamic environment.
